page.title: 05Games We Play At School
page.content: At school we play lots of different games. We skip, we play with bats and balls, and we practise scoring goals at football. We like to play hide and seek too. The person who is "It", closes his eyes, and the others go and hide.Then the person who is "It" tries to find the others and catch them. Sometimes we play Rounders. We are divided into 2 teams. One team bats and one team fields the ball. The team who are batting hit the ball and try to run right round the pitch before the fielding team get the ball back. They try to get the batsman out by stumping the corners of the pitch or by catching the ball before it touches the ground. When the batting team are all out they change places with the fielders. The team with the most rounders wins.
